sentence.Network_en: The situation about studies deflagration to detonation transition in gaseous mixture, propellants and explosives is reviewed.
sentence.Network_cn: 本文综述了近年来在可燃气体 、 推进剂和炸药内,燃烧转爆轰问题的研究成果.

sentence.Network_en: The explosives can be detected for the impact force of their deflagration with the modified cantilever.
sentence.Network_cn: 为了更进一步提高检测灵敏度,本文还提出了一种改进型悬臂梁的研制.

sentence.Network_en: Deflagration of combustible cloud formed by hydrocarbon fuels dispersed in air can easily transfered to detonation.

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 17th cent.: from Latin deflagratio(n-), from the verb deflagrare (see deflagrate)

means.word_mean: 1. combustion that propagates through a gas or along the surface of an explosive at a rapid rate driven by the transfer of heat
